TextLibrary.Text: The Elven Knight has stopped you climbing the tree. You may try again.
The Griffon has stopped you taking the Eye. You may try again.
You must travel to Silvermyr and visit Queen Titania, asking her for the Eye of Sartek.
You must climb the Tree of Seeing in Silvermyr and take the Eye of Sartek.
You must take the Eye of Sartek.
You must return the Eye to the Horned Temple.
Tauron accepts the Eye of Sartek. Now only 6 pieces remain.
Having defeated the Elven Knight, you climb the Tree of Seeing.
Having defeated the Griffon, you take the Eye.
